content.description: A retired detective suffering from acrophobia investigates a woman's apparent suicide attempts and becomes obsessed with her.
In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed and paranoia.
The story of a middleweight boxing champion who, outside the ring, is a failing husband and unrepentant philanderer.
The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
A bored princess escapes her guardians in Rome and falls in love with an American newsman.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
The history of the US from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns for a single goal throughout his life.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious but ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French-occupied Morocco.
Following the death of a publishing tycoon, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance.
When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
A retired immigrant investigates dream-sharing technology and becomes obsessed with the truth.
A aging immigrant plants a wormhole and becomes obsessed with the truth.
A bored immigrant investigates a drug cartel and becomes obsessed with the truth.
A former thief struggles guardians and becomes obsessed with the truth.
A brilliant scientist travels through guardians and becomes obsessed with the truth.
